response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just any item; it's a unique piece that has been meticulously crafted and carries a personal significance. Given its importance to me, I am willing to consider offers for it. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $900,000 for this product. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between the value I place on it and what you are willing to invest. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring whether we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our interests.", "product_price": 900000}
